content.detailedDescription: I was traviling threw new mexico i was about 20 years old i spoted a shinney object in the distance i kept driving then about ten minutes later i saw the orb it would skip bush to bush huvering obove the ground making no sound some times it would be out in the open then i would see it really clear i watched it for about 15 minutes then it hit my car between passanger door and driver door left big indention on my car i stoped in shock i saw the ord one more time after it hit my car it was about tree feet away from me then huvered around my car went across the road on the other side of the desert and huvered to the other side ther is a lote more to tell contact me if you guyes want to here more it has been bugging me for years thank you for listing eric eversole
content.summary: Round metalic orb size of basketball hit side of car.

content.detailedDescription:
This sighting was one of many that i experienced in the middle of the city in sherman oaks, ca, from 2004-2007. i live in a townhome community, and around 6pm, i walked out to the parking lot area of my home, which is approximately 25 feet from my front door. 

i can't explain why i looked up, but i did, and hovering what would have been very high up in the stratosphere was what appeared to be what had to be an absolutely enormous grey oval, which, from my perspective, looked to be the size of my pinkie fingernail.

it was broad daylight, and the oval was illuminated on one side with the setting sun, creating what looked like a reflective stripe around the one side facing the sun. this oval was simply standing still, high above even the thin scalloped stratus clouds. even though the clouds were traveling south with the wind, the object remained perfectly stationary. this was my first clue that it wasn't some sort of weather balloon, as it would have been traveling with the clouds.

i pointed the object out to my partner, who acknowledged it, and that it was unusual, and she promptly went into the house. i remained observing it.

i knew it was not a weather baloon, and no idea what it was. it was clearly not an airplane, or a blimp -- if it was a blimp, it would have to be an herculean size, to be that large and above the status clouds.

i remained staring at this object for at least fifteen minutes. i did not change it's movement, simply hovered while the clouds traveled beneath with the wind currents. 

my then-neightbor came out of his townhome, and asked me what i was looking at, after having standing in the parking lot for so many minutes, staring at the sky. i pointed to the object, and responded that i was looking at what i thought was a ufo. 

he looked up, clearly saw what i was looking at, and at first said nothing, but then said it was nothing but a weather balloon. he seemed very uneasy. i told him it could not be a weather balloon, otherwise, it would be moving with the wind currents, not standing perfectly still. he became very uncomfortable, and ran into the house. i heard his deadbolt lock. he and his family were very devout fundamentalist christians, so perhaps there was content in the discussion he was uncomfortable with.

the large dark grey oval simply stayed up there for a very ling time, around twenty minutes, until it began getting smaller, and more faint, as if it were moving upward through the atmosphere. i was finally unable to see it, as it slowly continued to retreat upward, like riding up an elevator. it never made an radical movements, nor did it move forward or backwards -- only hovered.

i noted several other curious phenomenon with the same exact movements as the mysterious grey floating oval, from 2004-2007, in broad daylight, usually in evening and night times. the stationary hovering for long periods of time, and then the fading up and getting smaller, through the atmosphere. 

the oval was the most pronounced shape of all, although at one other time i noticed what appeared to be a hovering cigar-shape made up of several spheres, length-wise. other times, it simply looked like a point of white light that would fade to a more red color, and fade out, as it appeared to up and through the atmopshere over a period of several minutes.

i am from montana origianlly, and have seen unusual activity in the sky. however,i have never witnessed more "obvious" activity in the sky as to when i moved to the urban area of la. this surprises me, but perhaps, because of all the air traffic here, anything in the sky would not be so easily noticed.
content.summary: Dark grey, shaped like my pinkie finger nail.

content.detailedDescription:
According to my neighbor a few people were discussing an alleged ufo over the highlands airport in abingdon, virginia. so far, i have been unable to find these witnesses. however, several complaints were called into the local sheriff's office of a low flying jet going very fast over abingdon. this jet actually was so loud that it frightened my daughter who was outside playing at the time. i have confirmed that the jet did in fact fly over by talking to several witnesses, including my own wife. 

langley afb in northern virginia directed me to mcghee tyson in tennessee. attempts to file an foia electronically have failed (email is invalid and bounced back). i will be submitting the foia via snail mail today. 

according to langley and the sheriff's office in abingdon, military exercises were being conducted. i find this suspicious as i have lived in abingdon for about three years now and have never seen a military jet fly over that low. furthermore, since there is rumor of a ufo over the highlands airport, i feel this incident is worthy of further investigation. 

this incident has also been picked up by jerry pippen and included on one of his recent shows - on saturday.

it's worth noting that last year in abingdon there was a very significant sighting of two rectangular objects, among others, and is listed in mufon's database. this sighting took place around the same location - very close to the highland's airport.
content.summary: Low flying jet allegedly chasing ufo.

content.detailedDescription: I was on myspace when a friend said he saw something in the sky to the west, and it did not look like a star. i have always been interested in ufo's so i went outside to see for myself, at first i could not see it. then my boyfriend came outside to look also. i was about to give up when he said look over there behind that tree you can see something glowing. he is much taller than i am so he was able to see it, when i could not. i went out towards the alley behind my house and could see it clearer. i was not sure what it was i was seeing all i knew was that it was not a star, or a plane, or anything i have ever seen before. i then went inside my house to get my camera which is a nikon d40. i went to take pictures then i discovered i did not have my sd card in my camera so i had to go back inside and get it. i then ran back outside toward the vacant lot behind the alley. i took numerous pictures, the object in the pictures does not fully show what i saw. it was hanging in the sky to the west, it looked like a big bright ball of fire or a bright orange ball not sure which. the object seemed to stay and hover in the same spot. i was scared, and kind of excited i couldn't believe it. i continued to take pictures until the light started to fade out then fully disappeared leaving no trace behind. when i looked at the pictures on my computer i noticed when i blew them up 100% that in some of the pictures it looked like an orange cigar shaped object.
content.summary: Saw a bright orange object hovering in the sky behind my house to the west.

content.detailedDescription: Era como una estrella que iba de un lado a otro parpadeando rapido estaba en el espacio yo estaba en mi patio luego de tres minutos se separo en dos luego en 4 y luego en ocho luego desaparecio yo estaba asustado
content.summary: Era como una estrella roja que se movia de lado a lado pero muy rapido

content.detailedDescription: We were going shopping and just stoped at a sonic drive-in and that's when we saw the ufo. we were kind of freaked out but we finish up our meal and left to go and report it here. it sort of followed us, it sig-zaged away at a moment, then it came back but right as we crossed back into washington state (spokane county) it fanished. then when we got home our telephone and internet/cable were down until midnight (we were waiting for saturday night live). we felt so scared we actually went to a nearby family member to tell them and see if there internet was down. theres was too.
content.summary: We were eating a sonic when we saw it.

content.detailedDescription: It is just to long to report in text.
content.summary: I have video of ufo lights that i recorded from my cell phone while driving on monday may 11th, 2009.  my description would be much better verbally. somewhat hesitant to upload video here.

content.detailedDescription: It was in the fall of 2008.  i was walking a friend to her car and she noticed a bright object in the sky and stated i should take a look at that.  i said goodbye then ran in the house and retrieved my camcorder.  it's not the best but i did get some 480x640 stills before it was filmed over.  i believed it to be a planet and it still might be.  the shape seems wrong though.  it was viewed in the northwest about 3 palm hands high from a large ash tree in my yard. it could have been covered by a nickel. it seemed to be stationary.  while viewing it seemed to do a "flip".  i should have put the tape away so i'm sorry there's only these small digitals to view.  jupiter was seen in the northwest so i assumed it was that until i took video of planets and didn't achieve the same affect.
content.summary: Shape looks like a spinning top.

content.detailedDescription:
While laying on the grass saturday night taking photos of the night sky using my nikon s630 set to night landscape i saw an object on my left move and stop, move and stop, move and stop with about 1/2 second interval in between each move. i quickly shifted the camera to the location of the object and got off one photograph. since the shutter stays open longer filming at night i had to wait for the camera. i kept seeing this object continually moving and stopping. i got off one more shot before i did not see it again.

note: the time stamp on these photos in not accurate. this camera has a problem that needs to be fixed by nikon.The time and date is accuratly set in the time/date settings but the time stamp is not accurate.

this object was about 100' from the ground, probably less than that. it would not stay still long enough for me to make an accurate guess. the object is not very large, less than 50' in diameter.

i was very excited seeing this object. my original intentions were to go out and wait for it as i was expecting it and my hunch paid off.

looking at the photo one can easily see the object and then the movement, then stop and more movement before stopping again.
because the shutter stays open longer using night landscape the camera captured the object and the movement. great camera best i ever owned. great night photography.
content.summary: Round object moving and stopping over and over with less than one second interval between moves.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside at work to have a cigarette and noticed a star next to the moon and thought how weird it was that this was the only visible star in the sky and how bright it was.  then as i stared around at the sky to try to see other stars (which i finally noticed a few dim stars), i saw 2 glowing shapes flying across the sky at super speed, but very low to the ground. it wasn't lights but more of a luminescent glow that was very dim. there was nothing flashing, no blinking lights, just the 2 glows. i couldn't really tell any shapes of a spacecraft, only the glow. they were going very close to the ground, maybe 30-50 feet up. as they passed above me, they crossed each other like they were swapping places...Right glow to the left, left glow to the right, and just speed off across the sky. they were absolutly silent as i remember hearing nothing but the grass crunching under my feet as i stared at them in awe. i've seen hundreds of airplanes cross the sky where i was, and have never seen anything that you couldn't tell was a plane by the blinking colored lights and visual shape of the plane. not to mention it was far to close to the ground.  i was very scared, heart pounding at what i was actually witnessing, but i had watch it and follow it until i could not see them any longer because i knew it was such an extraordinary event.  after they flew so far away i could no longer see them, i got very paranoid and started looking at the clock to make sure no odd/missing time had passed.  i just sat in utter awe and shock afterwards.  i just could not believe what i had just seen.
content.summary: 2 luminescent glowing objects crossing the sky criss-crossing.

content.detailedDescription:
While at the part i saw an object in the sky and took a photo. i thought probably a plane but took the photo anyway.
later on while looking at it i realized it's a perfect boomerang shape. could be a conventional craft, who knows.
the object was moving slowly and since i thought nothing about it i didn't pay anymore attention to it. 
now i regret not using a zoom to get a closer picture.

pay not attention to the time stamp. my new nikon s630 is the greated camera i have ever owned but the time stamp is different that the actual camera settings. i need to contact nikon for warranty.
content.summary: Object in sky strange shape.

content.detailedDescription:
Kenny p is on the case . here are some of my weird ufo footage ! these pictures are the real deal . i had the camera very steady . josh beyer again 

2: am . worm like ufos to the north west , about 1/2 a mile from my house . 254 upper neck r.D pittsgrove township nj 08318 . the cam i was using 7 mega pixels digital . these certain worm like u f o s were stationary in the sky about 100 feet up . it is best if you reach me on my house phone . 856-358-3784 . 

these certain events , tend to happen every 2 to 3 day's on this rode . in front of my house , is green branch park . these are the pictures , the newest ones ! although i have not gotten a chance in the past . to upload them . i think somebody needs to get some real good equipment & bring it on out here . allot is being missed ! 

my batteries drain in less then 4 minutes , bran new . out side during these events  ....If you guy's did not get my pictures - contact me . i will upload them again . 

thank you -mufon sincerely [cms/tg/pid] :)
content.shape: Circle,  Fireball,  Flash,  Star-like,  Other,  Unknown
content.summary: Worm shape ufos / fireball / pictures 7 mega pixls digital.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside and i noticed something out of the corner of my eye.  i looked up to the sky, and saw a glowing object traveling west to east.  it was round; or rather it was a larger sphere with two smaller spheres on the bottom.  it was totally silent.  the larger sphere glowed orange, and the smaller spheres were blue.  it was not a plane, and it did not look like any meteor i ever saw.  it moved too quietly and too fast for a plane, and too slowly to be a meteor.  the orange glow was very distinct.  the two smaller spheres on its bottom were too large for aircraft lights and were not flashing or bright enough.

as i said, the object traveled west to east, low in the sky.  it wasn���t tiny, nor was it large.  it was much larger than a meteor.  it was not a fireball.  the glow seemed to come from inside the sphere.  it didn���t leave any trail; there was no sound, and no electrical malfunctions at my house.   when the object passed over me, and was east of me, it completely disappeared. it wasn���t far enough away to have been out of viewing range.  it was there and gone.  just like that.    i stood outside a while to see if there was any more activity, but i saw nothing else except for flashes of light from a thunderstorm far to the east-southeast.

this is the second time i have seen a ufo in the past 4 months.  the other one disappeared, then reappeared, then disappeared again.  i hoped this one would reappear, but it did not. it was just before 1 am central time.


i shook my head after it disappeared and said aloud:   "awesome!"
content.summary: Orange sphere with  2 blue spheres attached.

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling back from paulding, oh to antwerp, oh on cement plant road traveling northwest. i noticed a slow pulsing brilliant bronze colored light with a pure white flashing light that changed patterns between 1 to 3 seconds a pattern (1 sec flash, 2 sec flash, 1 sec flash, 3 sec flash, repeat) hovering in place which then started to move north west towards antwerp almost parallel with my own direction. this strange light was at a high altitude as it appeared small, but very bright. it then suddenly dropped altitude very abrupt and quickly maintaining the same speed and direction. i noticed that the pulsing bronze light appeared to remain constant in a peak diameter before retracting back into a single point of light and then back again. both the pure white flashing light and bright bronze pulsing light suddenly started changing in intensity, appearing to randomly change from very dim to very bright. it then began to accelerate and crossed out of view in about 2 to 3 seconds. i believe the lights were fixed onto something as they moved together perfectly.
content.summary: Slow pulsing bright bronze light with patterned bright white flash changed altitude at acute angle very abruptly while traveling at very high rate of speed.

content.detailedDescription:
In car with wife driving home from movies.  spouse was driving.  both of us witnessed the event.  driving nw on county line rd. approximately 4 miles nw of rt 611.  

sighting started with seeing 3 birht white lights in triangle pattern low and to the left ahead of vehicle just above tree line.  lost sight for approximately 10-15 seconds due to trees.  nest saw to our left for approximately 25 seconds total.  again 3 bright white lightsin triangle pattern.  two or 3 red light now visible on underside of object.  object was now clearly siloutted against low cloud cover.  shape was a very distinct black triangle.  the bright white lights were at each tip of the triangle.  object was moving slowly to the southeast.  

after first sighting thought maybe it was a c-130 landing at nearby willow glove naval air station.   i am a aviation buff, former student pilot and travel weekly by commercial air.  i am pretty familiar with most aircraft and can identify what is and isn't normal.  after further consideration and discussion with my wife, we know what we saw.  there is no doubt in our minds this was not an aircraft.  we were not paniced and tried to reacquire sighting by going back in the direction it was going but could not do so.  i've followed ufo oly all my life but never expected to really see one.  my wife was a skeptic but is now convinced.
content.summary: Driving home from the movies and noticed bright lights in triangle pattern.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving my employer's truck on i-81 north, going around a turn near the towns of hanover/ashley pa, when i saw this fast moving, bright bell-shaped object in the distance, traveling south. as it moved closer to me, i could clearly see it's shape. it was bell-shaped and it may have been either white, silver or gray in color. it was hard to tell because the sun was reflecting off of it, but yet i didn't have to squint my eyes to look at it. it did not have any visible windows or any type of wings, tail or propeller. it did not make a sound or leave an exhaust trail. it was moving at a good speed that when i pulled out my cell phone to take a picture, it had already passed. i was in the left-hand lane and couldn't pull over. i wasn't able to follow the object in my side mirror because i was rounding a turn. at first i couldn't believe what i saw, but then as it sank in, i was really excited. i saw my first ufo. i just wish i was able to get pictures.
content.summary: Bell shaped ufo seen in broad daylight.

content.detailedDescription:
I am writing this on behalf on my dad and my brother who saw something amazing on the 13th march 2009. my dad and my brother just dropped my brothers girlfriend off on march 13, 2009 at around 7:15 pm, and were driving down santa barbra road and saw an orange thing in the clouds. my dad and my brother thought thought they saw some bats fly over the street posts they both said, they said they looked far too big to be bats. then they saw lights appear in the sky and spiral around in a circular formation like how a tornado goes or like a really big light show. my dad drove really slowly and they were covering an area far too big to be the friday night football game which was going on at brisbane (queensland). then in three seconds, all they lights took off at a very fast speed and the thing which is amazing is that they took the clouds with them, they said after it you could see the stars. they said the clouds were sucked away like a vacuum cleaner sucking a fog like substance out of a jar. they flew in the distance for another ten minutes and they said they could still just see them. they were very freaked out my amazed on what they saw that night. another thing to add is that tihs happened on the same day and month that the phonix lights occured (13th march 1997)

thanks.
content.summary: Lights about the size of a pea a little smaller.

content.detailedDescription:
i am 65 and a retured police chief from illinois.

 on feb 18, 2009 i was on a eupopean vacation with my adult son.  while driving north through the black forest of germany, my son stopped to take a picture.  while driving away i took a picture through the windshield of our vehicle.  upon returning to the usa i had the film developed.  a ufo is clearly in the picture.  enlarged to 8/10 and with low magnification you can plainly see the octagon shape of the craft.  

  if you would like an 8/10 copy please inform me as to who and where to mail it. i will be happy to work with you as i respect your integrity.
note:  i did not see the object when i took the picture.

  sincerely yours,


  dennis baraks
content.summary: Took picture of buildings in black forest ufo on film.

content.detailedDescription:
i was in my truck, a 'dock-high' box style on i-77 heading south going to akron from cleveland at 2:35 in the afternoon. i do local freight deliveries for a living.

the weather was 72 degrees, road was dry, sky was bright nearly cloudless with clear blue sky, no haze. 

just past state rt 18 is the state rt 21 split where i-77 curves to the left [mileage marker 136] after which i-77 travels for a straight section about two miles long.  

i had just completed the curve and was beginning this straight section eastward. naturally my point of focus is on the road and my mirrors. but in my peripheral field of view i noticed up ahead and slightly to the left of the freeway a bright spot low in the sky. it was either directly above or beyond a wooded area adjacent to i-77 known as fort island park in fairlawn.  

looking directly at it i saw the bright light to be what seemed to be shiny silver sphere.  i would say it was about one mile ahead and a hundred yards to the left of the freeway. it wasn't real large [huge] but wasn't tiny either. it was about the size of a quarter held at arm���s length.  

i often drive this road between cleveland and akron. at first i thought ���that���s curious, wtf?��� my first thought was it seemed similar to and was positioned relative to the freeway to one of those aviation warning devices suspended along high tension lines seen near airport runways but those are normally bright orange. i dismissed this possibility as i knew there weren't any airports over in that area. i continued observing it noticing its reflective qualities strugling to justify what i am seeing.  

 then for some reason i decided what i was seeing was a blimp that just happened to be pointing directly head-on and so it would appear spherical and that any moment the blimp would deviate and i would see the normal side length appear. keep in mind that akron is home base for goodyear's blimp and it's not uncommon to see it flying up to cleveland for indian's game coverage so seeing a blimp is not unusual around here.  i stared at it for a good fifteen seconds or so. i remember saying to myself 'what is that??? what is it? it was a good distance away so detail wasn't clear but it seemed as if it was a mirror like reflective quality. i remember thinking i'll get a better idea what it is when i pass it up ahead.

i looked away because i needed to checked my mirrors prior to changing lanes from center to the slower right hand lane.  after successfully changing lanes i tried to relocate the sphere it was gone.  i thought it must have moved momentarily out of sight behind an approaching tree line and i would see it in a moment passing by but it never did reappear. 

the object appeared relativly stationary. i did not see it move from it's original point.  

 coincidentally a few minutes later when i was in central akron area there in the sky was the real blimp which is painted primarily dark blue with the word goodyear down the side. nothing close to what i saw up the road.  i realized this blimp [the real one] is much smaller than the object i���d seen earlier particularly because this blimp was closer than the object i saw previously. i knew it couldn���t have been the same object because i was going a lot faster that the blimp normally travels.  it was only when i saw the real goodyear blimp that i couldn't explain what i'd seen earlier.
content.summary: Observed a silver sphere.

content.detailedDescription:
Just about to get into the car heading to work. i saw a bright light that appeared to be a planet or bright star.
i don't ever recall seeing a planet in this location so took a quick photo. the sun had not come up yet.
the photo shows a light in the sky but upon zooming in a triangle shaped object can easily be seen. 
there is a bright light on each of the three points of the triangle.

at first i did not think it was a ufo and still don't but it's very unusual looking.
i did not lose sight of it, i had to go to work and figured i had not photographed anyting important until i looked at it later.
in addition i saw another object and photographed it. i have no idea what it is but it appears to be moving.
content.summary: Triangle looking object. bright light on each of the three points.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on the deck when i noticed a jet with contrails. then i noticed another object with no contrail very close to the jet which was about 3 times the size of the jet or more. as they moved to the west, the larger cylinder shaped object moved way ahead of the jet until my wife and i lost
track of both. we got the binoculars out and were able to see the cylinder shaped ufo very clearly. 
it was long and skinny and white colored. it had something in the middle of it, like spokes sticking out or something sticking out. it seemed to be divided somehow in the middle. the ufo started out on the other side of the jet going at first the same speed as the jet but then it went a lot faster
and went kept putting more distance between it and the jet. 

the ufo disappeared while we could still see the jet and contrails in the distance. 

we were astounded and excited when we saw it and, of course, very curious. 

the ufo was too far away and moving too quickly and getting even further away to take any pictires or a video. i wish we could have because it was so clear through the binoculars.
content.summary: Object was beside and in front of a jet airplane.

content.detailedDescription:
I stepped outside on my backyard patio at 22:08 to sky watch and observed a very bright beige-white sphere, pea sized at arms length, moving in a straight line wnw to ene at 60 deg elevation for ~ 30 sec.  i called my daughters (age 11, 7, and 6) who also witnessed the object in a clear night sky that did not blink and made no sound.

at first i told my daughters that we were observing the space shuttle and hubble telescope yet upon checking spaceweather.Com the iss was not tracking 42.3 lat., -83.2 long on 05-14-09 nor any other listed satellite at 22:00!

next at 22:20 i again walked outside to my backyard and observed a sharp star sized white ball with medium brightness moving straight line ese to ene at 80 deg for ~ 20 sec.  i again called my daughter (age 11) who also witnessed the object moving toward the direction of the first larger object seen 12 min earlier.  

it seemed that the second sphere was vectoring toward the first larger sphere's flight pattern at a faster relative speed as we lost sight due to a large tree in our neighbor's front yard. 

finally at 22:32 again in my backyard i observied a star sized sphere materialize first very bright white than dim to pale white at 90 deg traveling slower yet reversing the second sphere's direction for ~ 10 sec.

it seemed that second sphere was returning from its mission 12 minutes earlier as it slowly dimmed to invisable in the clear night sky also being observed by my daughters (age 11, 7, and 6).  the 12 minutes between each sighting seemed a structured pattern to me?

also acknowledge that esa launched a satellite from french guinea on 
05-14-09 and am unaware of its orbit pattern.
content.summary: First of three ufo sightings from 22:08, then second 22:20, and third 22:32.

content.detailedDescription:
On sunday about mid day, may 10, 2009, on a clear sunny day, i was walking around in my yard looking at my plants leafing out when i noticed a plane flying overhead. it was flying from east to west and then i noticed the contrails from the plane because they were shorter than those i normally see in the sky from my yard.  from my view the two contrails appeared to be only about 5" long.  while i was looking at the plane and the contrails, suddenly there just appeared in mid air coming from the north a white ball traveling pretty fast.  the white ball crossed behind the plane's path about an inch (in my view) from the end of the 2 contrails from the plane. the ball was traveling in a straight line from north to south and was visible for only about 6 to 7 seconds before suddenly just vanishing.  it probably traveled about 10" to 12" (in my view of the sky) before disappearing.  there were a few fluffy white clouds in a different part of the sky, but none were anywhere near where i saw the ball or the plane.  the ball appeared larger than the plane.  it was cloud-colored white and was slightly smaller than an aspirin held at arm's length.  it was moving fast--much faster than the plane.  because of the height of the plane, it barely appeared to be moving at all as the ball crossed its path.

i don't know what i saw, but it was round and was the color of a white cloud.  it just appeared in the sky, was traveling fast, and then just disappeared. the event lasted only seconds and it startled me to see something out of the ordinary.
content.summary: White cloud-colored ball appeared in sky traveling fast from north to south and suddenly disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
I was 14 years old, sleeping in a haystack with friend, we were about 4-5 miles north of moses lake, washington. we noticed an orange, circular ring making strange movements in the sky approximately two miles away at an altitude of 2 to 3 miles. the object was moving relatively fast in a zig zag at what i concidered imposible angles (some greater than 90 degrees); then the object hovered and seemed to wobble,then it moved very quickly to directly over us. looking straight up at it looked about the size of nickle held at arms length and we cound see the orange ring and three lights at the center of the circular ring that continually changed colors from red to greenish blue and a violet. we had no idea what the object was and did not become alarmed until it hovered over us. we then paniced and got on our bikes and headed back to town. the most frightening thing to me was that there was absolutely no sound.
as we were leaving the area we heard the roar of the two f-86's heading straight for the object and we stopped to see what would happen. when the jets approached the object it lit up in extreme brilliance like looking at a welders torch, then it just shot of at incredible speed and left the two jets like they were standing still. the oject was over the horizon in a blinding flash. simply gone. the jets circled and returned to larson afb, i have always assumed the afb picked up the object on radar and scrambled the jets to investigate. my friend and i were shaken and afraid. i told my father (he was chief flightline inspector for the boing plant there in moses lake)and he laughed at me, i did'nt mention the event for many years for fear of ridicule (particularily back in the fifties).
p.S.
i had a second sighting of an pulsating egg shaped object on the ground in the rolling hills of missouri at approximately 2 am while driving. it was on the other side if the freeway about 200 feet away and i could see it plainly. i stopped my car, turned out the lights to observe it and thought of going across to look closer then i became frightened and drove away. i swear the sun came up about 20 minutes later, i don,t know what happened to the time and all i remember was driving away. this was in 1974 and i was driving from new jersey to texas after my discharge from the army. i was then 33 years old. the hills there in missouri go up and down like a roller coaster; i had just topped a hill when a blinding light from the next hilltop hit me and an 18 wheeler right behind me. the light completely blinded me but it only lasted perhaps a second then switched off. the 18 wheeler did not stop and he damned near ran over me when a pulled off the interstate. if you are interested i can submit a separate report on this incident.I really want to know what really happened and what happened to the approximately 4 hours in time.
sincerely,
 
patrick d. mccabe
content.summary: Sighted in air, pursued by two f-86 sabre jets from larson afb.

content.detailedDescription:
Last night, my girlfriend and i saw a ufo powerup and caught it on my digital camera. it is one of many sightings this week, here near rogers city. i have a hunting camp outside of town and have been observing ufo's for over five years here. i consider it a hot spot. the ufo in the picture was traveling east and is the brightest spot to the right in the picture. there are two other orbs of light to the left, that were not seen when i snapped the photo, only the one to the right was vilible.
it flew in, powered up and continued crusing until it was out of sight. this is common here, i see them almost every night. after viewing it for maybe two minutes, we saw, what i presume was an f-16 heading toward the object. this is also very frequent. the f-16's kinda patrol a permimiter around the area of my camp all day and night. i would like to have someone with the right equipment film the sky around my camp for a few nights, if the sky is clear, i promise you will see exactly what i have been wathcing for years. please feel free to call or email me. i kinda wanna keep this under wraps until we can say for sure what's going on. because i think the airfore is involved. hope we can work together soon. the activity has really ramped up in the last week. thanks for your time.
content.summary: One of many sightings finally caught on camera.

content.detailedDescription:
Helo,
        i live in port melbourne. on thursday at about 0615 i saw a very strange light rather close to the earth... closer than a star but it looked like a very bright large star, more like a large light. it drew my attention as i sit outside to have my morning coffee & i had nver seen anything in that part of the sky before at that time in the morning.It was more like a  light from a helicopter but no sound & not moving (well to the naked eye that is)
            i decided to try and take a photo of it, using my phone camera ( 5.1 megapixels) when i zoomed in on it was so shocked the object was multicoloured lights, oscillating, & "morphing" it's shape from a circle to sphere to a cylinder changing colour all the time & moving very  fast darting in & out of the camera frame. i managed to take a picture and also video it. i was recording it for over 15 minutes and was amazed at the way it was moving & the colours. the sun started to rise & the light/object seemed to move away back into the sky then suddenly disappeard very quickly as the sun was rising.
                i ran back in to  the house to show my son the picture and video, the picture was there but the video would only play for acouple of seconds & then stop i had taken many clips & each clip did the same thing even though i was continuing video for many minutes at a time.
                 now the really freaky part about this is later that evening i found a strange message on my phone when i picked it up saying "remove memory card & press o.K." i don't have a memory card in my phone, i just pressed cancel.I contiued on keeping the kids etertained but noticed that there was a lot of static in the air i kept getting a shock from touching objects and touching the kids. i never thought anything about it at the time until the next morning when i was going to transfer the footage & pics acrosss to the pc & found that all my media photo's, video's & music had been deleted from the phone! 
                i tried using the camera & video player that worked fine, but when i connnected the phoneto my pc i have found that  the e drive memory is now existent now! 
                    i strongly feel that the sighting is connected to what happened to my phone & without wanting to sound weird it's alsmost like they didn't want me to show any anybody else although my son did see the picture initially & thought it was very "cool".
are you able to tell me if there were any sightings at this time reported? also can you recommend someone who may be able to examine my phone. i am also hesitant to say but feel it's worth mentioning that i had a very strange dream a week earler which left me emotionally drained for days, it was very real... i was flying through the air on a triangular shaped "surfboard" object. however i was pulled into the air on it by a very strong force that seemed to draw me up from my abdomen area... i couldn't move or stop it. i'm not saying i was  abducted  but if was an extremely strange experience one that was so real & is vivid in my mind.
                             i hopte you don't think i am strange for what i have said, but felt i needed to tell someone. thanking you. 
                                      your's sincerely,
content.summary: I saw an unusal light, decided to video it and found when i zoomed in that it was multicoloured, oscillating & changing shape to cylinder, moving erratically & very fast, later the photographic evidence seemed to delete itself later that day.

content.detailedDescription:
Kenny pfeier is on the case . 

well again at 11 pm . we walked to the drive way once again . there was 1 ufo to the north . it was orange and it was a disc . it looked like orange fireball . after a while about 30 minutes of it being stationary . it moved to the north west . sat there for another 15 minutes it was spinning disc . then for more popped up , to the north east sat there stationary for about 25 more minutes . they were the same type of ufos i bin reporting! 

2 weeks ago as well from this date , there was a craft that landed in green branch park . it was all different.... it was like the same crafts i bin explaining . the guy that lives back in them woods called , the n.J state police , in bridge ton nj . 451-0101  area code 856 . there was state police all over looking for these lights ! i do not know what they seen ? green branch park is on my rode right in front of my house to the north ...

one ufo flew over my house took out my lights and had a humming weird sound , very weird about 2 days ago .Every time i go out side with my digital camera the batteries drain real fast & my watch stops !I would be lucky if i get 4 shots with my cam until my batteries go , as of being drained . 

there is massive ufo avtivtey / the paranormal on my rode and at green branch park / garden rode my name is [cms/tg/pid] . my dads name is [cms/tg/pid]
content.summary: 4 ufos to the northeast . 1 ufo to the northwest . 1/2 a mile aways 200 feet off ground.

content.detailedDescription: I was in the back garden.My area i live is surrounded in wooded areas.I was relaxing as it was a sunny day and there were hardly no clouds in the sky.What caught my attention was a shinny glint,then when i looked closer i actually was really excited as i know this was something out of the ordinary..As i kept watchinh it ,it glinted again.I assume this was because of the sun reflecting off it.It was shaped like a rugby ball.Not sharp egdes.Very smooth.It was high up ,but i couls still make out the shape easily enough.It did not make any erratic moves.Just kept goong on it way.I was buzzing at this time and was looking around for people to shput at them to watch this.My wife was in the house and she came running out and saw the object aswel.The forst thinh she said was "is that a ufo" i sais it sure as hell looks like one.And it was moving much to fast to be a blimp or anything like that.No way.This was an egg shaped.Rigby ball shaped craft.That was going at some very fast speedy.Its hard for me to gauge the speed but if i had to guess o would say 250 yo 300 miles an hour.That is my report down to the exact detail.This was something i have never seen before on my life and i have helecopters and planes,jets flying avross my area alot.So i know the difference.Finish this for now.Thank you for listening to me as most people would think me mad.But in actuall fact they are the ones that are mad.Just my opinion.I saw this with my own eyes and im not the only one.My wife saw it aswell.Thank you for your time.
content.summary: Rugby ball. silver. dull in shade.

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching csi:ny and i stepped out on the back porch to smoke,during a commercial. it was approximately 2245, the night sky was very clear. i was facing west and scanning the sky from the south back to the west.  i watched some planes in the final approach to buffalo international airport and i was star-gazing towards the ssw-sw. when i dropped my gaze back to the horizon, i noticed a very bright red and white light. i immediately pasted it off as a plane.  it's position was approximately 200 to 240 degrees at about 10-15 degrees off the horizon.  just about the same as the planes making the final into the airport. from where i was, i figured it was over lake erie at about port colborne.
i watched for movement, expecting it to continue eastward, but it didn't. it made some quick movements, like short spurts, horizontally and vertically. it remained in approximately the same general area within a degree. that's when i realized it wasn't a plane and the hair on the back of my neck rose. i kept trying to orientate the object to a stationary one on the ground (a spruce tree), but the light was very bright (in relation to the night sky) making it difficult to maintain a good point of reference.  it wasn't illuminating, just a very bright pinpoint.  i went inside to wake my brother-in-law, but i didn't, i wish now i had.  i returned outside to see if it was still there, and it was. i went back inside to get my phone to call my wife, i opened it to check the time (2254), watched about a minute of csi:ny, then returned to the porch to call her. it was gone by the time i had returned to the porch. i called my wife and told her about it. she joked they were going to come and get me. i'm fifty years old and i sort of had the heebie-geebies.

i had seen another object when i was about 8 or 9 at my grandparents house in athens,texas. it was in the western sky and about the same attitude. my dad told me he thought it was just a helicopter or something. it just hung in the sky too. i'll tell you i had nightmares for the two weeks i stayed at my grandparents house. i still remember that evening. i just past it off as watching too much "outer limits".
content.summary: Spotted bright red/white light to sw of position at 10-15 degrees off horizon.
